data.Name: Drained Glory
data.Bio: Drained Glory is an alternative music group that was formed in 2010 by guitarist/vocalist, Kelli Fletcher, and bassist, Zach Chechile. Since the inception of the group, it has gone through several changes. It is now currently comprised of Kelli, Zach, and drummer Jesse Burke. Since it's formation, Drained Glory has played in over 12 states and has been on two east coast tours. They released their debut album "Nothing Left to Lose" in 2012 and are currently hard at work on their full length album "Sink or Swim. Read more on Last.fm
